creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
I'm using a tag library that is included using the uri "/uiTags". With Tomcat 3.1 it works nicely. It also worked with an early beta of 3.2. However, Tomcat 3.2 fails with an error and complains that it can't find the file "...\myApplication\uiTags".

If I copy the tag library descriptor from WEB-INF/jsp/ui-taglibs.tld to the document root and renames it to uiTags everything works!

It appears that the taglib tag ín web.xml is ignored somehow. As it works with 3.1 (and Orion) I think that the web.xml file is correct.

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text: This seems to work OK in 3.2.1.
